mapper.select: SELECT sdi1.disease_code, ANY_VALUE(sdi1.create_time) as create_time, ANY_VALUE(sdi1.x) as x, ANY_VALUE(sdi1.y) as y, ANY_VALUE(sdi1.z) as z, ANY_Value(sdi1.disease_id) as disease_id, ANY_VALUE(sdi1.degree) as degree, ANY_VALUE(sdi1.model_code) as model_code, ANY_VALUE(sdi1.is_repair) as is_repair, ANY_VALUE(d.parent_id) as parent_id FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi1 INNER JOIN(SELECT sdi2.disease_code, max(sdi2.create_time) AS create_time FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi2 WHERE sdi2.is_deleted = 0 AND sdi2.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY sdi2.disease_code) AS sdi3 ON sdi1.disease_code = sdi3.disease_code AND sdi1.create_time = sdi3.create_time LEFT JOIN vis_disease d ON d.id = sdi1.disease_id GROUP BY sdi1.disease_code

SELECT d.parent_name as name, ANY_VALUE(COUNT(d.parent_name)) as value FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi1 INNER JOIN(SELECT sdi2.disease_code, max(sdi2.create_time) AS create_time FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi2 WHERE sdi2.is_deleted = 0 AND sdi2.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY sdi2.disease_code) AS sdi3 ON sdi1.disease_code = sdi3.disease_code AND sdi1.create_time = sdi3.create_time LEFT JOIN vis_disease d on sdi1.disease_id = d.id where sdi1.is_repair = 0 GROUP BY d.parent_name

SELECT sdi.disease_code, sdi.is_repair, sdi.create_time FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi LEFT JOIN vis_disease d on sdi.disease_id = d.id WHERE d.parent_id = '20001' AND sdi.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND sdi.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY ANY_VALUE(sdi.create_time)
SELECT d.id, d.`name` FROM vis_disease d WHERE d.parent_id = #{diseaseTypeId}

SELECT d.name as name, ANY_VALUE(COUNT(d.name)) as value FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi1 INNER JOIN(SELECT sdi2.disease_code, max(sdi2.create_time) AS create_time FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi2 WHERE sdi2.is_deleted = 0 AND sdi2.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY sdi2.disease_code) AS sdi3 ON sdi1.disease_code = sdi3.disease_code AND sdi1.create_time = sdi3.create_time LEFT JOIN vis_disease d on sdi1.disease_id = d.id where sdi1.is_repair = 0 and d.parent_id = #{diseaseParentId} GROUP BY d.name

SELECT sc.component_name as name, ANY_VALUE(COUNT(sc.component_name)) as value FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi1 INNER JOIN(SELECT sdi2.disease_code, max(sdi2.create_time) AS create_time FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi2 WHERE sdi2.is_deleted = 0 AND sdi2.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY sdi2.disease_code) AS sdi3 ON sdi1.disease_code = sdi3.disease_code AND sdi1.create_time = sdi3.create_time LEFT JOIN vis_specific_component sc on sdi1.specific_component_id = sc.id where sdi1.is_repair = 0 GROUP BY sc.component_name

SELECT sdi1.degree as name, ANY_Value(COUNT(sdi1.degree)) as value FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi1 INNER JOIN(SELECT sdi2.disease_code, max(sdi2.create_time) AS create_time FROM vis_specific_disease_info sdi2 WHERE sdi2.is_deleted = 0 AND sdi2.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY sdi2.disease_code) AS sdi3 ON sdi1.disease_code = sdi3.disease_code AND sdi1.create_time = sdi3.create_time where sdi1.is_repair = 0 GROUP BY sdi1.degree
